chat.title: Catalisa Team
messages: Hi! I saw your website and want to know more about WhatsApp automation.
Hello! Great to have you here! I can help! Do you already use WhatsApp Business?
Yes, but everything is still manual...
Perfect, I'll show you how to automate it in minutes. Can you tell me a bit about your business?

differentials.title: Fast response
differentials.description: Our team responds in less than 1 hour during business hours.

differentials.title: No commitment
differentials.description: Open conversation, no pressure. We want to understand your scenario first.

differentials.title: Personalized demo
